m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- High-tech breath testers stalled A batch of new, high-tech breath testers that may prevent police from inflating the number of roadside tests is sitting in a storeroom in Parramatta, caught up in red tape. April 14 2004 Joshua Dowling NSW police have bought up to 800 handheld breath testers that can record the blood-alcohol reading in each test and the number of tests, and include satellite technology which pinpoints their location to within one metre.
